Text:
Looks like this is for 1.14, which means you won't be able to build apps for iPhone OS 2.0, because they requires signing.
Hopefully, some kind person would upload the build chain for 2.0, becuase it's a nightmare trying to build it

To sign it, download "ldid" thats an L not an I. LDID.

Then in mobileterminal type

ldid -S "/path/to/compiled/app"

Capital S is required!
